stories.text:
A fellow of mine looking for a team ready to relocate to a South Asian country to launch a multi-year project to manufacture entry-level smartphones designed from scratch, or at least deeply customised mediatek reference design.

They are already making smartphones from knockdown kits, but have zero EE/Software expertise in house. They are nearly 100% manufacturing people.

Is it even possible to have a readymade team procured from somewhere? Or will it need building a team from scratch?
stories.title: Ask HN: How will you hunt for a smartphone brand CTO+team?
Did I deliver value on June 17th?

stories.text:
I've been trying to switch from Chrome to Firefox as my primary browser, however I've noticed that Gmail and YouTube are unbearably slow in Firefox (no customizations). Other sites work perfectly fine.

Has anyone else experienced something similar? Any tips to fix?
stories.title: Ask HN: Why are Google sites so slow on Firefox?
